about.description: I create software that not only meets business objectives but also enhances the user experience. My focus encompasses both frontend and backend technologies, allowing me to create comprehensive, effective, and efficient solutions. I am committed to building applications that provide real and lasting value. Let's bring ideas to digital life and make them stand out!
about.button2: Take a look at my projects

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: This section showcases some of my key projects. Some of them I developed as a full-stack effort, while others were done in collaboration with colleagues within an Agile framework, applying SCRUM. I enjoy fully engaging in projects to deliver value to both the business objective and the user, keeping the needs of both parties in mind throughout the process to achieve positive outcomes.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: I feel most comfortable working with the technologies listed below, but due to my curiosity and interest in ongoing learning, I strive to enhance and improve my skills by developing and researching new software technologies as well, aiming to create better products and high-quality solutions.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: I'm eager to talk to you and determine how I can contribute to your project. Don't hesitate to contact me!
contact.name: Name

1.description: A Landing Page for an agricultural company with the goal of bolstering its digital presence. The information architecture is geared towards providing a clear and straightforward user experience, communicating the services offered and the company's added value, with a focus on facilitating a swift and personalized contact process between the visitor and the company via WhatsApp.

2.description: This innovative e-commerce platform connects travelers with a travel agency that provides personalized travel packages and activities. The admin dashboard is a valuable addition designed to streamline and enhance the business. It is crafted to improve the user shopping experience and provide the admin with excellent management tools.

3.description: This handy, fully responsive application functions like a recipe book, where the user can discover over 100 recipes, create their own recipes, and delete them if desired. Furthermore, users can search for a recipe by its name or keyword, filter them by dietary type, and sort them alphabetically or by health rating.

4.description: This is an academic project I developed to apply all the technologies learned during the bootcamp, such as React, Redux, CSS3, Express, Sequelize, and PostgreSQL. In this application, users can log in, search and filter over 750 characters from the Rick and Morty series, save their favorites, and delete them if desired.
